page.title: Project Homepage
page.project: Translating between XML and Relational Databases
page.name: Sridhar Sarnobat

update.description: Submitted report with working application. Hereafter some time on extra coding, plus preparing Monday 21st June presentation.
Resumed schema translation. Changed so that the XER model is build exactly, and not some hybrid between ER and XER.
Met Khalil Amiri to inform current progress
Resumed work on project following exams. During the next week I did a 1st pass coding of all areas of project: data importing, exporting, console interface (later scrapped), graphical user interface
Demonstrated application so far. Only gave some tables with primary keys and attributes (with some incorrect names, but not simple elements.
Threw away first attempt and began work on a more organized parsing framework.
With home directory not working, began to write report.
Began to work out the theory of schema translation using XER.
Meeting with Khalil Amiri. Resumed coding. Rejected Xerces API in favour of Eclipse XSD Infomodel API
Learning XSLT for writing report and creating this page. Tried using DocBook and DB2Latex.
Searched for papers and read a book regarding XML Schema to Relational structure conversion
Searched for APIs for XML Schema
Investigated APIs available for processing XML
